publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1066 Iain Gray: Hibernian Training Centre, East Mains—That the Parliament welcomes the opening of Hibernian Football Club’s new £4.9 million training centre at East Mains, Ormiston; notes that the training facilities on the site, which extends to more than 50 acres, include five international-size grass pitches, an international-size floodlit outdoor synthetic pitch, an indoor synthetic pitch and a gym; commends the commitment by Hibernian FC to develop part of the complex for community use, and believes that such training centres represent a welcome investment in developing future generations of talented Scottish footballers.

S3M-1066 Hibernian Training Centre, East Mains (lodged on 19 December 2007) Claire Baker*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rhona Brankin*, Trish Godman*, Stuart McMillan*, David Stewart*, Helen Eadie*, Jackie Baillie*, Patricia Ferguson*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Brian Adam*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bob Doris*, Karen Gillon*, Bill Kidd*, George Foulkes*, Keith Brown*, Ian McKee*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-1066 Hibernian Training Centre, East Mains (lodged on 19 December 2007) John Park*, Robin Harper*
S3M-1066 Hibernian Training Centre, East Mains (lodged on 19 December 2007) Jack McConnell*
S3M-1066 Hibernian Training Centre, East Mains (lodged on 19 December 2007) Hugh Henry*
